basics.name: TaeKyung Kwak
basics.label: AI/Data Engineer | Fullstack App Developer
basics.summary:
Enjoy working with AI and Coding, with particular interest in AI/Data, Flutter, and Rust.
 Development does not end at implementation — Value understanding concepts deeply and applying them to real services.
 Growing as a Machine Learning Engineer and AI-driven service developer, with experience in App launches, Dataset publication, Hardware optimization, and Offline team collaboration.

projects.name: Cat Can Talk
projects.description: A Flutter + FastAPI based chatbot app, can see a real-time animated GIF of a cat's emotions.
highlights: Leveraged Upstage Solar Pro 2 for good performance and a low-cost API
Used nginx, certbot for https authentication.

projects.name: Collatz Conjecture project
projects.description: Generated and published a 100m Collatz sequence dataset.
highlights: Mathematical puzzle that has not been solved for a long time, even if it is a simple problem.
Published on Hugging Face with 500+ downloads, Graph page viewed 1000+ times
Optimized computation using Rust, C++, and Cuda

projects.name: My Blog
projects.description: Moving from Gitbook to a site I developed myself.
highlights: I developed my own blog for freedom.
Use Azure static web app, Firebase, Flutter, Zola, HTML to achieve both design and SEO
Responsive widget that looks great on both computer and mobile.

projects.name: mini project
highlights: poe chatbot - Two philosopher chatbots available on the Poe platform, Socrates, Marcvs Avrelivs persona. https://poe.com/taery
deletter - App that comes with 3 letters a day. Flutter, Gitgub Gist https://apps.apple.com/us/app/d3letters/id6752533431
this resume - resume-schema(json), aws static web
VS Code Sketchbook Theme - 80+ installs on VS Code Marketplace Featured in Flutter Developer Community, Linkedin. https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=taery.sketchbook-color-theme

projects.name: project plan
highlights: Developing __visualizing Keras, data structures/algorithms__. Plan to use Flutter, Python packages.
Unity in Openai app sdk. Use three.js, gltf. https://github.com/TaeKyungg2/unity_openai_app

certificates.name: Korean Olympiad in Informatics 2013 - Seoul Regional Silver Prize
